emails.preview: Your new account is ready to use

Welcome to Western Union. Now you can send money online anytime, from anywhere. Your final receiver can pick up the money at a convenient Western Union agent location, or get it sent directly to their bank account or mobile wallet.
As we welcome you back to flying after the most difficult year in our history, we know extra time and understanding is important for everyone while we all adjust to what our "new normal" looks like.
